definition: to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)
clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]

sentences.english: With love at first sight, our hearts are linked, changing the moment into eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 只是一见钟情，两颗心已相通，刹那化成永恒情浓。

sentences.english: Piscean tends to be generally good-natured and very kind and loving.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼座更倾向于和蔼，友好而钟情。

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place for artists and poets.
sentences.chinese: 泰山历来是画家骚客所钟情的聚集地。

sentences.english: Sam's interest tends towards the reputedly 'ugly' and predatory side of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 山姆钟情于海洋所谓“丑陋”和弱肉强食的一面。

sentences.english: Finally he ordained also representing her sister's a loving to forest.
sentences.chinese: 最后他出家也代表着她对林妹妹的一片钟情。

sentences.english: That there's no such thing as love at first sight or first kiss.
sentences.chinese: 世界上没有一见钟情或一吻定情这种事。

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place of artists and poets.//
sentences.chinese: 泰山历来是画家骚客所钟情的聚集地。

sentences.english: She was five years ago, and Lee Hyun-Prince Edward meet by chance, love at first sight.
sentences.chinese: 她五年前和李贤太子萍水相逢，一见钟情。

sentences.english: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person. (Mignon McLaughlin)
sentences.chinese: 成功的婚姻总是多次坠入情网，但钟情于同一人。

sentences.english: The young man cooed over the girl.
sentences.chinese: 小伙子对着女孩钟情地低语。

sentences.english: He had never discouraged her devotion to him.
sentences.chinese: 对于她对他的钟情，他从未报之以冷淡。

sentences.english: A maid with many wooers often chooses the worst.
sentences.chinese: 追求者多的少女往往钟情于最糟糕的家伙。

sentences.english: You always fall in love with women with beautiful eyes!
sentences.chinese: 你老是对电眼美女一见钟情。

sentences.english: Snowster on the Surge in love at first sight Maoruo angel.
sentences.chinese: 唐伯虎对貌若天仙的秋香一见钟情。

sentences.english: Is there really love at first sight?
sentences.chinese: 这个世界上真的存在一见钟情吗？

sentences.english: I love crystal chandeliers and use them as often as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我钟情于水晶吊灯，所以尽可能多的使用它。

definition: to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to treasure/to be very fond of
to have a special fondness (for sth)
to be infatuated with/to be enchanted by/to be passionate about
to be partial towards sth/to favor/to prefer/preference/favorite
